Koga Shuko:



Shuko looks to Sixshot.  "You are here to do the deeds required by Galvatron 
in your...previous...life.  To crush Autobots.  Only this time, they are 
descendants of that filthy race.  We will crush all of the factions here this 
past Earth, and mine it dry."
